page.title: 02Aberford-Clubs and Societies
page.content: {Badminton Club}Sec.Mr.A.Dunning.Meets Village Hall Wednesdays.Activities- badminton and social events. {Youth Club}Sec.Mr.K.Butler.Meets Village Hall on Mondays.Activities- snooker,pool,darts etc {Tuesday Club}Sec.Mrs.J.Driffield.Meets Village Hall alternate Tuesdays. Activities-bingo,cards etc.Over 55s. {Aberford School Parent Social Group} Meets in school once each term.Stages social events and raises funds.All parents welcome. {Football Clubs}Aberford Albion,Arabian Horse and Swan Athletic. {Countrywomens Association}Sec.Mrs.Bean Meets in school 2nd Tuesday of month. Over 16s.Activities-visits,speakers, demonstrations. {Pigeon Club}Sec.D.Nicholson. {Horticultural Sociaty}Pres.Mr.F.Watson meets monthly at Royal Oak
